text: Leslie Odom Jr. (, born August 6, 1981) is an American actor and singer. He has performed on Broadway and in television and movie, and has released three solo jazz albums. He is known for the role of Aaron Burr in the Broadway musical Hamilton. He won the 2016 Tony Award for Best Actor in a Musical and the Grammy Award for Best Musical Theater Album. ==References== Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American autobiographers Category:Actors from New York City Category:Writers from New York City Category:Singers from New York City
title: Leslie Odom Jr.
